current-chamber.#text:
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED
		  STATES

official-title.#text:
Providing for a conditional adjournment or
		  recess of the Senate and an adjournment of the House of Representatives.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
recesses or adjourns
			 on any day from Friday, March 22, 2013 through Tuesday, March 26, 2013, on a
			 motion offered pursuant to this concurrent resolution by its

or
			 his designee, it stand recessed or adjourned until 12:00 noon on Monday, April
			 8, 2013, or such other time on that day as may be specified by its

or his designee in the motion to recess or adjourn, or until the time of
			 any reassembly pursuant to section 2 of this concurrent resolution, whichever
			 occurs first; and that when the

adjourns on Monday, March 25, 2013, on a
			 motion offered pursuant to this concurrent resolution by its

or
			 his designee, it stand adjourned until 2:00 p.m. on Tuesday, April 9, 2013, or
			 until the time of any reassembly pursuant to

of this concurrent
			 resolution, whichever occurs first.

, or their respective designees, acting jointly after
			 consultation with the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Speaker of the House of Representatives

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, shall notify the Members of the Senate and House, respectively, to
			 reassemble at such place and time as they may designate if, in their opinion,
			 the public interest shall warrant it.

attestation-date.#text:
Passed the Senate March 23 (legislative day, March 22),
			 2013.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SCON 11 ES: Providing for a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate and an adjournment of the House of Representatives.
